Name: Fru Fru
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Dry, bitter grapefruit complimented by passion fruit and strawberry.
Nutrition: One serving of Fru Fru contains 170 calories
